question: Analyze the impact of various social media engagement metrics on company brand perception.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify relevant social media platforms used by the companies and their engagement metrics.","table":["SocialMediaInfo","CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":2,"task":"Extract company profiles including their descriptions and industry types to assess brand perception contexts.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":3,"task":"Analyze social media engagement data against company profiles to identify trends or correlations in brand perception.","table":["CompanyInfo","SocialMediaInfo","CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":4,"task":"Compile reports summarizing findings on how social media engagement affects brand perception across different industries.","table":["IndustryBusinessTrend"]}]}
